app_description: My Memos Voice Recorder Voice Memos is a full featured free voice recording app with a streamlined and intuitive user interface. Press the big red button to record voice press it again to stop and manage your recordings all with just a fingertip. High quality sound reproduction. Don t forget recording music! You can also use it to record voice over. There s no time limit in this audio recording app. iPhone audio recording for all occasions whether you want to record meetings lectures interviews speeches lessons band practices family memories and so on anything you want to save and listen to later with this sound recorder app. Audio Recorder easily share edit with you recorded audio and memos. You can also manage each voice recording. Professional Voice Recorder for all iOS devices! No limitations Secret Voice Recorder Background voice recorder Completely FREE! My Memos can record directly in MP4 AAC and WAV PCM formats plus convert function for all supported formats. You can share any recording memos straight from the audio recorder app anywhere you want. It s not just a voice memo app but a powerful tape recorder and lecture recorder to record any memorable sound in your life. Just press record button to quickly record audio come and try it! My Memos is spy voice recorder background voice recorder and secret voice recorder features allows users to capture high quality audio without drawing attention to themselves.
